Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details: [[DM.Factions[faction_ClanJadeFalcon],CLAN JADE FALCON]] INVADES LYRAN SPACE! Dustball, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLyranAlliance],Lyran Alliance]]: Taking advantage of the confusion of the FedCom Civil War, Jade Falcon forces have been reported throughout the Lyran [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreARDC],Arc-Royal Defense Cordon]]. On Dustball, the Seventh Falcon Regulars and the Jade Falcon Eyrie Cluster landed, quickly inflicting heavy casualties on the local militia brigade. Meanwhile on Koniz, the mercenary [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBarbersM2s],Barber’s Marauder IIs]] were utterly demolished by nothing more than a mixed force of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreElementals],Elementals]] and the 124th Striker Cluster. Scattered reports from the area indicate that the Marauder IIs were hunted down to a man, with the survivors taken as [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreIsorla],isorla]]. Although the full extent of the Jade Falcon incursion is currently unknown, additional reports of Jade Falcon units engaging Lyran forces continue to trickle in. Would you like to know more?

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details: Continuing their assault on Lyran holdings, the Turkina Keshik and the Third Falcon Swoop swiftly defeated the mercenary Grave Walkers unit on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKookens],Kooken’s Pleasure Pit]]. Although an important center of economic activity for the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedCom],Federated Commonwealth]], with a bustling tourism and pleasure industry, it is unclear what the typically stoic and reserved Clanners stood to gain by taking the world. Likewise, the strategically unimportant world of Newtown Square fell to a mere trio of Falcon clusters as the battered Fourth Donegal Guards under Leutnant-General [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAdamSteiner],Adam Steiner]] retreated before the meticulous Clanner assault.
